name: Tails Goes To The Liquor Store To Get A Cheeseburger
name_original: Tails Goes To The Liquor Store To Get A Cheeseburger
description: Tails and his family are very hungry and need him to get a cheeseburger. Along the way you'll face many foes and make some friends (?) with a small number of secrets to find. Can you learn the skills to jump through this 2D Platformer to get the most perfect cheesebunger out there?
